title: Marriott Executive Apartments Elevates Standards for Long Term StayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Marriott Executive Apartments Elevates Standards for Long Term Stay Published on : Wednesday, September 30, 2015
Marriott International, Inc. is delighted to introduce its first apartment brand to Xi’an, the Fairway Place – Xi’an, Marriott Executive Apartments this September. As the brand’s seventh property in China, The Fairway Place – Xi’an Marriott Executive Apartments offers 159 full serviced apartments, ranging from studio to three-bedroom that are ideal for both business and leisure travellers.
Being the oldest of the Four Great Ancient Capitals of China, Xi’an is where the Silk Road begins and home to the Terracotta Army of Emperor Qin Shi Huang. It is now also part of the government’s economic revival of interior China. The city of Xi’an has re-emerged as an important cultural, industrial and educational centre of the central-northwest region.
MEA Xian Bedroom“Demand for long-term stay apartments for business travelers has grown tremendously within the past few years in Asia, especially in China. The Fairway Place – Xi’an, Marriott Executive Apartments is an example of how the long-term stay category has evolved and developed to accommodate the needs of this market segment.” said Henry Lee, Chief Operations Officer, Greater China.
“Like other Marriott Executive Apartments, the property is designed to help extended stay travelers feel at home,” continued Lee. “The apartments are spacious, conveniently located and come with housekeeping service. Whether travelers stay here for project work or for relocation, they will find the Marriott Executive Apartments a home away from home.”
Located at the center of Hi-tech development zone, which is base for major corporations including Oracle and Fujitsu and 40 minutes from the Xi’an Xianyang International Airport, The Fairway Place – Xi’an, Marriott Executive Apartments is strategically situated at the Centre Business Distract of Xi’an. Within a five-minute walking distance to New Center park, housing international renowned coffee shop, state-of-the-art spa and LS Express, the property provides great convenience for long-stay business and family travelers.
Designed by renowned hospitality design specialists Karen Wang Interior Consultant, The Fairway Place – Xi’an, Marriott Executive Apartments offers 159 luxury apartments. Dark wood colors set the overall tone for the room interiors, while accents of crème marbles bring a sense of elegance. Enriched natural lighting creates a cozy ambience for residents. Starting from 40 sqm to 110 sqm, each apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen, washer/dryer, storage and includes separate areas for rest, relaxation and work. The feeling of home is enriched with hotel amenities including a 24-hours fitness center, a kid’s garden and 24-hour concierge service. A 110 sqm function room with natural lighting is available for business meetings or social events alike.
Source:- Marriott International
